headline: Iron Mountain Beats on Q4 FFO, Lags on Revenues, Hikes Dividend
summary: IRM's Q4 results reflect solid performance in all business segments but are marred by higher interest expenses year over year.

headline: Iron Mountain (IRM) Surpasses Q4 Earnings Estimates
summary: Iron Mountain (IRM) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 3.33% and 1.32%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Iron Mountain (IRM) Surpasses Q4 Earnings Estimates
raw.summary: Iron Mountain (IRM) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 3.33% and 1.32%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Iron Mountain: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Portsmouth, New Hampshire-based company said it had profit of 35 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, came to $1.24 per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Iron Mountain: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The Portsmouth, New Hampshire-based company said it had profit of 35 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, came to $1.24 per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.

headline: Iron Mountain Increases Quarterly Dividend per Share by 10%
summary: PORTSMOUTH, N.H., February 13, 2025--The Board of Directors (the "Board") of Iron Mountain Incorporated (NYSE: IRM), a global leader in information management services, declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.785 per share of common stock representing an increase of 10% which is payable on April 4, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on March 17, 2025.

raw.headline: Iron Mountain Increases Quarterly Dividend per Share by 10%
raw.summary: PORTSMOUTH, N.H., February 13, 2025--The Board of Directors (the "Board") of Iron Mountain Incorporated (NYSE: IRM), a global leader in information management services, declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.785 per share of common stock representing an increase of 10% which is payable on April 4, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on March 17, 2025.

headline: Ooredoo and Iron Mountain Partner to Accelerate Data Centre Growth Across MENA
summary: DOHA & PORTSMOUTH, N.H., February 13, 2025--Ooredoo Group and Iron Mountain today announced a landmark strategic partnership, which will see the global leader in information management services take a minority equity stake in Ooredoo’s carrier-neutral data centre company, MENA Digital Hub.
